ModMetaData.name: Craft with Color
ModMetaData.author: kathanon
ModMetaData.description:
Allows setting the color of any dyeable item in the workbench order. Also allows using any color in the styling station, not just the predefined ones.
1 dye is added to the ingredients when crafting specific color (same cost as dyeing it later, can be turned off in options).
You can now also choose style for any item that has alternate styles.
